pr_title: Extend Document weight attribute interface to use dictionary snapshot

timeline.message:
Extend Document weight attribute interface to use dictionary snapshot
(for reproducible lookup) and store enum index for lookup key.

timeline.bodyText: drop virtual and final and just make the class final.
